pullRequest.title: [MINOR] Fix caller to SparkBulkInsertCommitActionExecutor
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed calling the wrong constructor
Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

commit.message:
[MINOR] Fix caller to SparkBulkInsertCommitActionExecutor

Fixed calling the wrong constructor

nodes.bodyText: this results in error  "java.util.HashMap cannot be cast to org.apache.hudi.table.BulkInsertPartitioner"
